subject: AI & Agents
title: Where Bias Enters the Pipeline
description: Learn Where Bias Enters the Pipeline in one minute.

hook.text: A hiring model rejects every resume from a certain zip code. Nobody told it to.

buildup.text: Bias hides in training data: who wrote it, who was excluded, and what got over-represented.

discovery.text: If 90% of CEO profiles in the data are male, the model learns 'CEO = male.'

twist.text: Even balanced data can encode bias through proxiesâ€”zip code predicts race, name predicts gender.

climax.text: Audit every stage: collection, labeling, training, evaluation, and deployment.

punchline.text: Bias isn't a bug. It's baked into the data.

quiz.question: How can a proxy variable introduce bias?
options: Zip code can predict race without mentioning it
